subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. board of governors approved the sale of the St. Louis Blues yesterday to a group headed by Dave Checketts, the former president of Madison Square Garden. The deal, reached March 24, transferred ownership of the Blues — which had the league's worst record this season — and the Savvis Center from Bill and Nancy Laurie to Checketts and his Sports Capital Partners and Towerbrook Capital Partners.
